Rotisserie roast your favorite foods with healthy and tasty results. The NutriChef Vertical Countertop Rotisserie Oven provides you with hassle-free food prep ability. Use the included skewer tower and insert your favorite meat. Operation is simple -- insert your food, set the rotary timer and the oven does the rest! Save time and money thanks to simple food preparation with the NutriChef Vertical Countertop Rotisserie Oven.
